name: Hide YouTube Video Sidebar
description: Hides the recommendations sidebar on a YouTube video page.
additional_info:
For those who are trying hard to give up spending much of their precious time on YouTube. This will hide the recommendation / related videos sidebar from the video pages, will also help you not to get distracted by something else while watching a video.

Feel free to post reviews, suggestions, and queries. Will add more of my ideas to it if receive good response. Cheers!
